package.name: EZTweakList.
package.shortDescription: Export a list of your tweaks.

descriptionlist.description: Easily export and share a list of all tweaks on your device with EZTweakList! To use EZTweakList, simply open Cydia, tap the Installed tab, and then click the export / share button (located on the top navigation bar). After installing the tweak, you need to respring so that the export button appears in Cydia.
